question: According to Kautilya which of the following was referred to as the Dharmapravakta?
explanation: According to Chanakya also known as Kautilya, the king was referred to as the Dharmapravakta in Mauryan administration. He was the promulgator of social orders as he issued Rajasasana which are royal rescripts and maintained porana pakiti, i.e., ancient rules and customs.
